sentence: Beds are crazy comfortable and free mini bar drinks very welcome
Breakfast at Cocotte was also amazing great food great service great ambience
Cleanliness nice breakfast comfort
breakfast is included and is delicious
breakfast was good toenjoyed my staycation there
There are some shelves a Nespreso machine and a wardrobe with a safe and a small bar fridge stocked up with free nonalcoholic drinks
I did not eat at the restaurant but the room which was illuminated in various colours of your choosing was very comfortable and the outdoor jacuzi looked lovely
Breakfast very good and everyone we met where very helpful
Breakfast here truly sets you up for a day around Singapore

And consequently they did not get my S25 for breakfast each morningIncidentaly turn right out of the hotel walk 25 m and you will find an excellent restaurant called Roots that has a good and good value dinner set for S50 nett
For those looking for Halal cafe there is one nearby the malayan council

If travelling with another person pick another kind of room not the pantone unles you want to share every noise and smel It is a bit noisy outside thanks to an alley cafe bar photo of the view and bar cafe The room is definitely not sound proof
After being awake for 4 hours I would have really appreciated to have a complimentary breakfast to feel at home in the hotel

We ate in the food court across the street on the corner which was easy to sort out do not order salad prawns unles you like fried prawns mayo and fruit a little weirdWe left next morning before 6 am and they sorted the taxi and even made breakfast to go
They serve percolated coffee with horrible long life milk so you are better off having the chai tea with your breakfast it is a little on the sweet side but still enjoyable
Had dinner at the hotel restaurant
Could have tie ups for tour packages and also improve breakfast menu for vegetarians
On the first level of the hotel themed Industrial Glam by Asylum you will find outdated industrial pieces scattered throughout the entrance lounge wine bar and restaurant
Just avoid the overpriced restaurant downstairs
Allowed me to work from the cafe area during non opening hours as i needed to complete stuff for work
